venues.name: Bodhi Spa
venues.review: Boston's most interesting wellness destination — a halotherapy salt cave and infrared sauna complex in Somerville with serious credentials and a devoted local following. The signature experience is 45 minutes in the hand-carved Himalayan salt cave. Genuinely unusual and genuinely effective.

venues.name: The Spa at Mandarin Oriental Boston
venues.review: The Mandarin formula applied to Back Bay, which means it's excellent. Heated vitality pool, thermal suite, skilled therapists. The outdoor terrace in warmer months is a pleasant surprise. Boston's gold standard for hotel spa.
